title: Technical Specialist II NEW!
full_description: R2C is seeking a Technical Specialist II to support with the following qualifications:Minimum 2 years of compatible composite mechanics; 5+ years Aerospace Composite Mechanics/prototyping/production and repairs experience. Experience can overlap/run concurrently.R2C provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.Job Posted by ApplicantPro
